title: Purim at Mekor | Mekor 3
text: Skip to Main Content Membership Events Donate Kiddush Center City Beit Midrash Join Us Davening Who We Are Kosher Restaurants More Support Mekor Purim at Mekor Mon, Mar 02 | 1500 Walnut St #206, Philadelphia, PA 19102, USA Register Now Time & Location Mar 02, 2026, 5:30 PM – Mar 03, 2026, 12:00 PM 1500 Walnut St #206, Philadelphia, PA 19102, USA Guests + 4 other guests About The Event Join us at Mekor as we celebrate Purim with Megillah readings, and a festive Purim party for the community. Monday, March 2nd 5:30pm – Mincha 6:15pm – Maariv Megillah Readings, Purim Party Tuesday, March 3rd 6:45am – Shacharit & Megillah Reading Read More > Register Now Share This Event Mekor Habracha Center City Synagogue (215) 525-4246 admin@mekorhabracha.org ​ 1500 Walnut St Suite 206 Philadelphia, PA 19102 SUBSCRIBE TO OUR WEEKLY NEWSLETTER Enter your email here SUBSCRIBE Latest Newsletters Copyright ©2025 by Mekor Habracha Synagogue

    Purim at Mekor

    Mon, Mar 02

    Time & Location

    Mar 02, 2026, 5:30 PM – Mar 03, 2026, 12:00 PM

    1500 Walnut St #206, Philadelphia, PA 19102, USA

    Guests

    About The Event

    Join us at Mekor as we celebrate Purim with Megillah readings, and a festive Purim party for the community.


    Monday, March 2nd

    5:30pm – Mincha

    6:15pm – Maariv Megillah Readings, Purim Party


    Tuesday, March 3rd

    6:45am – Shacharit & Megillah Reading
